notes: All commands execute against the currently open Resolve project/timeline.
Clip indices are 0-based; track indices are 1-based.
For selectors, use exactly one of index, name, or all.
Batch execution continues on errors and reports per-op status.

ClipSelector.description: Selects clip(s) on a track. Exactly one of index, name, or all must be set.

ClipInfo.description: Clip with optional in/out points for append_to_timeline.
